name: A finely-crafted dagger, humming with latent energy (1h)
data: It has immense weapon class for its type (average in general).
It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'thrust'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'triple backstab'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'double thrust'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'anatomy'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'double backstab'.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'triple thrust'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'backstab'.
The dagger yearns to plunge itself in an enemy's back.
